items.text: good length on leg stump, got on top of the bounce and blocks this awkwardly away towards cover. They scamper through for the single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Moor, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, straightened after pitching. Hit back to the bowler off the back foot
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Moor, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, muscled back to Shakib off the back foot. Not letting the batsman get away
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Cremer, no run

items.text: full and wide outside off, hit very well but straight down long off's throat! Sharply taken by the fielder in the deep, racing in and diving forward. Struck hard, but off the toe end. Low catch to Rubel. Appreciation from the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Cremer, OUT

dismissal.text: AG Cremer c Rubel Hossain b Shakib Al Hasan 12 (20b 0x4 0x6) SR: 60.00

items.text: full on off stump, tapped back to Shakib once more
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Jarvis, no run

items.text: full on off stump, turned off his toes to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Jarvis, no run

items.text: full on off stump, big slog attempted and it's off the bat's toe end. It's a skyer, but falls just away from the man at mid on. Tough chance for the fielder who was running backwards
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Jarvis, 2 runs

items.preText: Sadekul : "Anything 200 up score will be challenge for BD" -- Definitely not an easy pitch to bat on.
items.text: full on off stump, driven off the front foot to short extra cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Moor, no run

items.text: full outside leg, goes down the leg side. Attempts to flick behind square, but misses the shot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Moor, 1 wide

items.text: a peach! Good length on middle stump, angles away from his body as he tries to poke at it with the bat's open face. The batsman's lucky it didn't brush his blade on the way through
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Moor, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, tapped towards mid off with soft hands. Early call for the run. Moor wants the second, but not possible this time
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Moor, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle and leg, angling once again across Jarvis' body as the ball comes off the back of his hand. Inches away from the batsman's bat as it goes through to Mushfiq. Foxed
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: Fizz is dominating here. Good length on leg stump, goes across his body once more as Jarvis fishes at it outside edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: finds the outside edge this time, but short of the keeper! Full on off stump, and Jarvis goes chasing at it. Defended with soft hands, and takes the edge, but just in front of Mushfiqur. They ask the umpire for the catch, but it had fallen in front
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.preText: Reshad: "Good thing about Shakib is he observes batsmen's feet movement till the last minute before he delivers the ball. Hence he is able to bowl wide when he sees batsmen are dancing down the pitch. "
items.text: yorker on middle and leg, dug away over the bowler's head through to mid off. Only a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Moor, 1 run

items.preText: Jason : "Whatever the score Zim end up with it's been a decent recovery from 30-3 " -- you're being kind. Need at least 200 to call it a decent recovery, imho.
items.text: slow, low, full toss on leg stump. Clipped off his pads to square leg. Can't put this loose ball away
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Jarvis, 1 run

items.text: yorker on middle stump! Backs away too much, as the delivery crashes into the base of the stumps. Moved away too much, and the ball was accurate!
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Moor, OUT

dismissal.text: PJ Moor  b Rubel Hossain 33 (58b 2x4 0x6) SR: 56.89

items.text: on a hat trick! Inside edge ricochets onto middle stump! Overpitched full and wide outside off, tries to drive at it, but no movement of the feet
items.postText: That's also Rubel's 100th ODI wicket. Can he celebrate his 101st with a hat-trick?
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Chatara, OUT

dismissal.text: TL Chatara  b Rubel Hossain 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.preText: Muzarabani, the debutant, will face the hat-trick ball. One slip in place. Rubel trying to take his second hat-trick of the career.
items.text: That will have to wait. Short and wide outside off, left alone. Not the best ball to bowl to a No. 11. Should've gone full and straight
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Muzarabani, no run

items.text: full outside off, muscled back to Rubel off the front foot. Nicely taken by the bowler on his followthrough
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Muzarabani, no run

items.text: full, slower ball on middle stump, angling away from Jarvis as he tries to slog towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, tries to slog towards the leg side but takes the leading edge over point's head
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, 1 run

items.preText: N: "100th wicket for Rubel, is it fastest by bangladeshi?" -- Nope. Third fastest after Razzak and Mortaza
items.text: full on off stump, but going across the batsman's body. Tries a wild slog but misses
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Muzarabani, no run

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, tries to play towards the leg side but takes another leading edge to short extra cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Muzarabani, 1 run

items.text: full on middle and leg, tries a heave over midwicket, but misses. Hits his pad, but was going to go down leg side, anyway. They scamper through for a single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Jarvis, 1 leg bye
